rpm.description: Drive train RPM at 12V. This is not motor RPM.

t_buffer.description: Buffer time in seconds (stop time in go, stop, turn, stop, go when auton coded go, turn, go)

clamp_offset_in.description: Clamp offset in inches (dist from edge of bot to far edge of mogo inside bot)

ring_node_offset_in.description: Picking up mogo/ring on field offset in inches; saves distance

wall_stake_offset_in.description: Offset for wall stakes in inches when F is pressed a second time.

padding_in.description: Added space between closest mogo point and wall when unclamping a mogo into a corner

plane_mode.description: VEX Conventional (Up = 0deg, Right = 90deg) = True, Unit Circle (Up = 90deg, Right = 0deg) = False

field_centric.description: If True, compute odometry relative to center field (logical (3,3)); otherwise relative to robot's initial position.

width.description: Robot width in inches (Distance from left to rightmost point PRONE TO HITTING WALL)

length.description: Robot length in inches (Distance from back to frontmost point PRONE TO HITTING WALL)

dt_width.description: Base width; Length from edge to edge, left to right

dt_length.description: Base length; Length from edge edge to edge, front to back

x.description: Horizontal offset (in inches) from the robot's geometric center

y.description: Vertical offset (in inches) from the robot's geometric center

pros_mode.description: Output Units: 0 = inches, 1 = encoder degrees, 2 = encoder rotations, 3 = encoder counts/ticks

gear_ratio.description: 11W V5 Smart Motor gear ratio. (18:1 gears = 18, etc.)
